modName: No red gem for Old Barbaric Armor
summary:
An alternative texture for Lagrie's Old Barbaric Wild Armor that replaces the red gem in the belt.
You will need the original mod:
http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51167/?
descriptionHtml:
Old Barbaric Wild Armor: no red gem edition
===========================================
A texture replacement by Autan Waspeez for the armour uploaded by lagrie, http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51167/?
>v.1.0
A small yet significant alteration to the principal texture, plus matching normal map.

Nexus only. You see this on Steam, it's been stolen.


Summary
=======

I was blown away when I saw the Old Barbaric Wild Armor by lagrie. It was exactly what I wanted for a roaming pagan character, the kind who thinks Daedra worshippers are poseurs and the Forsworn are Hagraven-hugging wimps. The kind who'd rather dance naked round a campfire with Spriggans than sit in some tavern listening to another tedious saga about some idiot who got themselves killed a thousand years ago.
...but...
I had to agree with some of the commenters: the big red gem(?) thing on the belt stuck out like a panic button. It just didn't fit the feel of the rest of the set. So I broke out some programs I haven't used since modding Fallout 3 and whipped up a texture alternative. Not better, just different. If you like it, please comment/endorse. If you don't like it, please provide feedback more creative and useful than 'retarded' or 'lol' or 'gay' or whatever people shout at you when you go past on the short bus :)

Likers gonna like, and hopefully endorse.

Installation
============
1. Ensure you have lagrie's Old Barbaric Wild Armor mod installed, active and endorsed. Duh.
2. Drop the 'Data' folder into your Skyrim directory, saying 'yes' to merging the folders.
3. Make sure your Archive Invalidation contains data/textures/barb/tsuncuirass.dds and data/textures/barb/tsuncuirass_n.dds, or do the necessary to make sure it does, like resetting Archive Invalidation in NMM. These are loose files and the original mod works from a .bsa, so it will override without permanently affecting the original mod.

Tools
=====
GIMP, DTXBMP, PaintShopPro 8 (!)

If you want to use this in any other mod, all I need is a credit, you don't have to ask me. I trust you'd be polite enough to ask legrie as well though.
author: Autan Waspeez
